Short deal description.Short deal description: Google LLC announced the acquisition of Mandiant, Inc., a leader in dynamic cyber defense and response, for $23.00 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $5.4 billion. The acquisition aims to enhance Google Cloud's security operations suite and advisory services, combining Mandiant's real-time threat intelligence and incident response capabilities with Google Cloud's cloud-native security offerings.

Short Business description (target compa.Short Business Description: Mandiant is a company that specializes in cyber defense solutions, providing dynamic cyber defense, threat intelligence, and incident response services. Founded in 2004 and headquartered in Reston, Virginia, USA, Mandiant delivers frontline expertise through its Mandiant Advantage platform, including products and services such as alert investigation, comprehensive protection, and managed defense.

Main rationale.Main rationale: Google is acquiring Mandiant to enhance its Google Cloud security operations suite and advisory services, addressing the increasing sophistication and severity of cyber threats faced by organizations globally. The acquisition will integrate Mandiant's real-time and in-depth threat intelligence, incident response services, and other security capabilities with Google Cloud's existing security offerings, such as BeyondCorp Enterprise, VirusTotal, and Chronicle's security analytics, to deliver an end-to-end security solution across cloud and on-premise environments.
